```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(covidrecon)
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE)
```

```{r pull-data}
covid <- covid_latest()
```

```{r center-covid-from-100}
selected_countries <- c("China",
                        "Singapore",
                        "Japan",
                        "Iran",
                        "Italy",
                        "Spain",
                        "US",
                        "United_Kingdom",
                        "Australia",
                        "France",
                        "South_Korea")
```

```{r covid-filter}
covid_subset <- covid %>% 
  filter(country_region %in% c(selected_countries, 
                               "United_States_of_America", 
                               "Germany", 
                               "Denmark"))
```


```{r covid-changepoint}
covid_changepoint <- covid_subset %>% 
  add_covid_change_point() %>% 
  filter(date >= change_point_date)
```


Cumulative 
=======================================================================

### Cumulative Incidence

```{r gg-covid-cumulative}
gg_covid_cumulative_exceed_limit(covid,
                                 selected_countries = selected_countries)
```

### Instant Effective Reproduction (facetted)

```{r covid-instant-repro}
covid_instant_r <- add_instant_reproduction(covid_changepoint)
```

```{r gg-effective-r-facet}
gg_effective_repro_facet(covid_instant_r)
```
